item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:15, topic:368848”][quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=464983.msg3400353#msg3400353 date=1289860950]

[quote author=pure2ownage link=topic=464983.msg3400348#msg3400348 date=1289860805]

[quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=464983.msg3400329#msg3400329 date=1289860514]

[quote author=pure2ownage link=topic=464983.msg3400321#msg3400321 date=1289860160]
Sega Master System II > Chaos’ 360
[/quote]ah my gowd u fweeking fawgget my sex box twee sixty pwns ur shiz noob!!1oneone111!!one!
[/quote]SMS2 Is an classic and I like it, the graphics might not be as good as the 360s but the games are actually fun and not stressing (e.g. black ops).
[/quote]very true… i miss the old playstation 1 games like spyro and crash bandicoot. good times, good times.

by the way…
“Is an classic”

*Is a classic.
[/quote]i knew da c was not a vowel, my bad sire.
forgiv me[/quote]NO BURN IN HELL

item.source: Xbox/Nentindo/Sony Which do you all prefer and why

item.title: Xbox/Nentindo/Sony Which do you all prefer and why
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

Xbox 360,

Iv played all 3 of them but i think xbox is more advanced and is the real deal.
My friends play it.

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:2, topic:368848”]personally, ps3
it has blu ray, its a wii now too, free online and it doesnt overheat every other second…
my friend is on his 5th xbox in 6 months span
i have xbox and ps3, and im satisfied with the ps3
plus xbox has too many 9 year old kids screeching into the mic.
and as a side note, that guy with the kinect looks like hes… uh… dunno but its funny
and the kinect is a copy of the ps2 itoy, if you dont know…
though i will say the move did copy wii, but now you can just kiss wii good bye for its special features, such as “working out” ect. now it just has exclusives, mario, etc.

ive also had a wii before my ps3, sold it for ps3, made a good decision.[/quote]

Iour “friend” needs to buy a xbox slim, and also, I honestly think your lying because i had my xbox for a year without rrod.

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox/Nentindo/Sony Which do you all prefer and why
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

The Wii is the only one of those three I have, and I like it. One of my friends has an Xbox 360 and I like that too. However, I don’t play on consoles much (because then I wouldn’t have time for MoparScape!) so I’m not really a good judge.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

personally, ps3
it has blu ray, its a wii now too, free online and it doesnt overheat every other second…
my friend is on his 5th xbox in 6 months span
i have xbox and ps3, and im satisfied with the ps3
plus xbox has too many 9 year old kids screeching into the mic.
and as a side note, that guy with the kinect looks like hes… uh… dunno but its funny
and the kinect is a copy of the ps2 itoy, if you dont know…
though i will say the move did copy wii, but now you can just kiss wii good bye for its special features, such as “working out” ect. now it just has exclusives, mario, etc.

ive also had a wii before my ps3, sold it for ps3, made a good decision.
